attributes.action: make it a legal requirement for knowledgable doctors to do ESA & PIP assessments
attributes.background: assessments for esa and pip need qualified medical knowledge of the conditions and how they can affect claimants. a 4 week training course is no replacement for proper medical knowledge of conditions and their affect on individuals on a daily basis.

rejection.details:
We think that this petition is very similar: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/207878
